newsitem.title: UK: Baltic Freight Index rises 8 to 1,453.
newsitem.headline: Baltic Freight Index rises 8 to 1,453.

text.p: The spot Baltic Freight Index (BFI) rose eight points to 1,453, reflecting a substantial jump in U.S. Gulf/Japan trade seen on Friday, brokers said.

Mitsubishi's fixture Galene for 52,000/5 long tons soyabeans for Dec 17/25 at $25.60 and $26.10 no combo/combo respectively, which compares with Hanjin's reported fixture yesterday of 54,000 tonnes heavy grain for Dec 17/20 at $24.15 no combo.
Demand for early tonnage and Panamaxes in particular is strong in most areas, they added.
